game: Warrior is a 2.5D Platform Action Adventure game set in a dark fantasy world. The player is cast a the ultimate warrior fighting to restore the kingdom and claim his throne.  In this game you will fight the evil monsters and minions of the Dark Lord. Explore a multitude of dungeons caverns and castles. Collect much loot and treasure for your quest.  As you embark on your journey you will develop your skills to mastery so that you can withstand the ever increasing challenges and most vicious Boss Battles. Unlock new paths as you venture forward finding secret keys. Challenge the Dark Lord to an ultimate dual - Victory shall restore the kingdom and grant you the throne as yours. Replay the game with greater difficulties and setting your goals for higher scores.
